addMouseMotionListener(Mouse.MouseMotionListener, int) - Static method in class input.Mouse

AnimatedTexture - Class in loading
This class is for binding and using animated textures
The textures must have the following file structure: [location]\[number of image].png
The first textures has to have the name 1.png TODO don't make this class serializable TODO implement destroy code
AnimatedTexture(String, int) - Constructor for class loading.AnimatedTexture
Create a new Animated Texture
animations - Static variable in class loading.TexManager
saves all loaded animation with their name
animationTimer - Variable in class loading.AnimatedTexture
